price: Lakini walio kufuru wamo katika kukadhibisha.
footnotes: Bali hao makafiri katika kaumu yako ni shadidi zaidi katika kukukadhibisha kuliko hawa walivyo wakadhibisha Mitume wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
